description: For the ultimate balance in warmth and breathability this lightweight insulated hoody excels during stop start activites. A combination of dual weight insulation and breathable fabrics allows you to push for the summit and keep warm at the top.
name: Rab Xenair Alpine Light Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 20D Pertex Quantum Air nylon (47gsm) \ DWR \ 1 cfm - 100% polyamide

specs.key: Insulation (Front, Back, Top of Sleeves and Collar)
specs.value: 60gsm Primaloft Gold Insulation Active+ (55% Recycled Content)

specs.key: Insulation (Sides, Underarms, Spine and Top of hood)
specs.value: 40gsm Primaloft Gold Insulation Active+ (55% Recycled Content)
